name: HITMIT
description:
Health is the most important thing a person has. However, during a pandemic, it is threatened by a large number of different viruses. How to protect yourself? How to deal with viruses? What can help strengthen our immunity? The answers to these questions are found by the main character of the game HITMIT

The game has an Info section with information about the coronavirus

Controls:

AD: Move left and right

WS: look up and down

left mouse button: shoot antiseptic

Esc: back
